resources.string: Tap the screen only when you see the real MVP!

In this screen you\'ll be able to create cards that will help you memorize whatever you want. Just tap the + button and write a phrase or definition that you want to memorize. Make sure to create at least three so that you can select this game when you set an alarm. Next time the alarm goes off, you will be asked to fill in some blanks in order for the alarm to go off! Good Luck!

This is where you\'ll be able to create flashcards that you can use to create multiple choice questions. Just tap the + button and write a term and definition that you want to memorize. You will be given a definition from your library of cards and four terms as answer choices, but only one of these terms is the correct answer! Make sure to create at least four so that you can select this game when you set an alarm. Good Luck!
